headline.main: Woman Accused of Stabbing Mom Seeks $1.5M Estate
headline.print_headline: Woman Accused of Stabbing Mom Seeks $1.5M Estate

docs.snippet: A Memphis woman who as an 18-year-old was accused of fatally stabbing her mother is fighting relatives for a $1.5 million inheritance — but her lawyer says her real goal is to prove her innocence....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Memphis woman who as an 18-year-old was accused of fatally stabbing her mother is fighting relatives for a $1.5 million inheritance — but her lawyer says her real goal is to prove her innocence.

headline.main: Attorney: Suit Against Confederate Emblem Not a Lost Cause

docs.snippet: An attorney says he's not surrendering his legal battle to erase the Confederate battle emblem from the Mississippi flag....
docs.lead_paragraph: An attorney says he's not surrendering his legal battle to erase the Confederate battle emblem from the Mississippi flag.

headline.main: Group to Vote on Urging Countries to Close Ivory Markets
headline.print_headline: Group to Vote on Urging Countries to Close Ivory Markets

headline.main: Siemian Didn't Let Magnitude of Moment Bog Him Down
headline.print_headline: Siemian Didn't Let Magnitude of Moment Bog Him Down

docs.snippet: Gary Kubiak didn't flinch when Trevor Siemian threw two interceptions in his first NFL start, and neither did the no-longer-unknown quarterback....

headline.main: Bill Gross Wants Pimco, Lawyers Punished for 'Bad-Faith' Tactics
headline.print_headline: Bill Gross Wants Pimco, Lawyers Punished for 'Bad-Faith' Tactics

docs.snippet: Bond fund manager Bill Gross on Friday said Pacific Investment Management Co and its lawyers should be punished for unfairly impeding him from pursuing his $200 million lawsuit against the asset management firm, which he co-founded....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bond fund manager Bill Gross on Friday said Pacific Investment Management Co and its lawyers should be punished for unfairly impeding him from pursuing his $200 million lawsuit against the asset management firm, which he co-founded.

headline.main: Review: Signs of Rebirth at New York City Opera
headline.print_headline: Writing a New Chapter in a Company’s History

docs.snippet: The company’s season opening, a double bill of the seldom-heard “Aleko” and enduringly popular “Pagliacci,” is a milestone in its comeback....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company’s season opening, a double bill of the seldom-heard “Aleko” and enduringly popular “Pagliacci,” is a milestone in its comeback.
